author: Bruce Osborne
subject: Re: OhayoCon Rocked My World - :)
body:
At 11:38 PM 1/28/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>If it comes w/a gun, it is a remote control car that is activated via
>sound.  The little gun makes it start/stop.  There is a red car and a
>yellow car version.

Yup! That's it, thanks Luis! Think we should make a special section on the 
website for toys and stuff, that would be neat.
